German[edit]

German Wikipedia has an article on:
Postkarte
Wikipedia de

Etymology[edit]

From Post +‎ Karte (“card”).

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈpɔstˌkaʁtə/
  • Audio
    		(file)
  • Hyphenation: Post‧kar‧te

Noun[edit]

Postkarte f (genitive Postkarte, plural Postkarten)

  1. postcard
